heading: HR00305
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE AUGUST 3, 2019 SEA TRAGEDY AT THE GUIMARAS-ILOILO STRAIT, WHICH RESULTED IN THE LOSS OF THIRTY-ONE (31) LIVES AND A MARITIME TRANSPORT CRISIS IN THE ENTIRE PROVINCE OF GUIMARAS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF LEGISLATING MEASURES TO PREVENT THE RECURRENCE OF FUTURE MARITIME TRAGEDIES AND ITS OTHER EFFECTS
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00305
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE AUGUST 3, 2019 SEA TRAGEDY AT THE GUIMARAS-ILOILO STRAIT, WHICH RESULTED IN THE LOSS OF THIRTY-ONE (31) LIVES AND A MARITIME TRANSPORT CRISIS IN THE ENTIRE PROVINCE OF GUIMARAS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF LEGISLATING MEASURES TO PREVENT THE RECURRENCE OF FUTURE MARITIME TRAGEDIES AND ITS OTHER EFFECTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NAVA, NA. LUCILLE L., M.D.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-09-09;
